test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Loads and Navigation Links Work
steps: Click on the 'Patient Care & Health Info' link.
Verify the 'Patient Care & Health Info' page loads successfully.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads without errors. 'Patient Care & Health Info' page loads without errors.

test_scenarios.name: Use Symptom Checker for Abdominal Pain
steps: Navigate to the 'Symptoms' section of the website (via Patient Care & Health Info, or search).
Select 'Abdominal Pain' from the search results.
Answer the initial questions presented by the symptom checker (e.g., age, sex).
Proceed through at least one question and answer sequence.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The symptom checker provides relevant questions related to abdominal pain based on the initial inputs.

test_scenarios.name: Find a Doctor in Rochester, MN
steps: Navigate to the 'Find a Doctor' or 'Find a Location' section.
Enter 'Rochester, MN' in the location search field.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A list of doctors and/or locations in Rochester, MN is displayed.
